title: The Best & Easiest Graffiti Lettering Styles

steps.title: Draw any word using a regular font, In this case, we’ll use 'sheep' in Arial Black.
steps.content: Draw any word using a regular font, In this case, we’ll use 'sheep' in Arial Black.

steps.title: Draw the style for 'h' to customize the style of the letters.
steps.content: Draw the style for 'h' to customize the style of the letters. Convey the form of scribbled letters.

steps.title: Draw the first letter 's' with embossed style which connects to the second letter.
steps.content: Draw the first letter 's' with embossed style which connects to the second letter.

steps.title: Draw the letter 'e' using straight lines and connected to the second letter.
steps.content: Draw the letter 'e' using straight lines and connected to the second letter.

steps.title: Draw the same letter 'e' but a little farther from its preceding letter.
steps.content: Draw the same letter 'e' but a little farther from its preceding letter. Follow the style.

steps.title: Draw the letter 'p' to convey scribbled style.
steps.content: Draw the letter 'p' to convey scribbled style.

steps.title: Draw the last letter 's' with the same style as the first letter and connected to the preceding.
steps.content: Draw the last letter 's' with the same style as the first letter and connected to the preceding.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines. Color to your liking!

steps.title: We'll try this with the word 'iris'.
steps.content: We'll try this with the word 'iris'. Draw the first letter 'i' using straight and curve lines to convey the style which is embossed.

steps.title: Draw the letter 'r' using straight and curve lines with edges like an arrow.
steps.content: Draw the letter 'r' using straight and curve lines with edges like an arrow. The letter is also draw higher than the first.

steps.title: Draw another letter 'i' which is higher than 'r' and with the same style as the first letter.
steps.content: Draw another letter 'i' which is higher than 'r' and with the same style as the first letter.

steps.title: Draw the last letter 's' with the tail elongated to the left and curved.
steps.content: Draw the last letter 's' with the tail elongated to the left and curved. Draw the edges to be sharp and pointed.

steps.title: Color to your liking, then design the background.
steps.content: Color to your liking, then design the background.
